name: karl
description: Very fast and simplistic logger that logs to the console.

scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
